meanings.definition: A plant of the borage family with bright blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The anchusa in the garden has vibrant blue petals.
meanings.sent2: I picked an anchusa to add color to the bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the anchusa, enjoying its nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the bright blue anchusa in the field.
meanings.sent5: The anchusa stood out among the green leaves, a splash of blue in the garden.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the borage family.
meanings.sent1: The anchusa genus includes various species of flowering plants.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different characteristics of each anchusa species.
meanings.sent3: The anchusa genus sounds like a magical kingdom of colorful blooms.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flowers, the anchusa genus reigns supreme with its beauty.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the anchusa genus reveals a world of diverse and stunning flora.
